resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

thisisnic commented on pull request #11676:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11676#issuecomment-979214887


   I think that if there aren't any drawback of doing it this way, this would be a good way of making it simple for developers to add things to `NEWS.md` on each PR and simplify collating these items ahead of a release, for sure.


--

dragosmg commented on pull request #11676:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11676#issuecomment-979218502


   @jonkeane suggested I looked into any unintended consequences with our merge script (I would say unlikely to have any conflicts). I've not yet looked into it.
   


--

jonkeane commented on pull request #11676:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11676#issuecomment-979235243


   Thinking about this a bit more, any negative impacts this might have on the merge script should surface when attempting to merge this. So I would be ok with attempting to merge it (consensus here looks like we're all good with it — though let me know if I'm missing something!) and if it fails I'll pass it back to Dragoș with the error log. Sound good?


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: This will solve the issue of merge conflicts when several people touch NEWS.md and, thus, will enable us to use it more freely.
fields.summary: [R] Enable merge by union for NEWS.md
